definition: of or relating to or constituting testimony, something that serves as evidence
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or constituting testimony
- expressing admiration or appreciation
= example: expressing admiration or appreciation
noun
- something that serves as evidence
= synonyms: testimony
- something that recommends (or expresses commendation of) a person or thing as worthy or desirable
= synonyms: recommendation, good word
- something given or done as an expression of esteem
= synonyms: tribute
